Author: 0rangevanillac0ke0
Text: Your feelings are valid but I promise everything will be ok! Taking it a day at a time is all you can do sometimes. Eating over maintenance is totally ok, you don't need to punish yourself and you aren't a failure or anything of that sort. Make sure you drink some water and stay hydrated so you don't get a hangover! If you need to eat to feel ok too that is totally fine, just do what you are comfortable with but I promise you are allowed to and things will be alright!
